content: siren is a modern mesh shawl that s the perfect finishing touch to throw over spring outfits crocheted in modern cotton dk this airy shawl is lightweight and has beautiful drape straightforward to crochet siren has both charted and written instructions finished measurements approximately 30 / 76 cm deep x 65 / 165 cm wide at widest point yarn berroco modern cotton dk 100 grs 1 hank #6691 diamond hill hooks and notions crochet hook size e / 3 5 mm or size to obtain gauge gauge 17 sts and 8 row = 4 / 10 cm in pattern stitch *gauge is measured after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge *
